item.title: glipy
item.description: noprobelm/glipy GLiPy is a Cellular Automaton Game of Life simulation library written in Python Python 7 0 GLiPy # GLiPy is a Cellular Automaton Game of Life simulation library written in Python.

item.title: glipy-cli
item.description: noprobelm/glipy-cli A front end for visualizing Conway’s Game of Life simulations using GLiPy Python 0 0 GliPy-cli # GliPy-cli is a command line front-end interface for glipy, a Cellular Automaton Game of Life library written in Python.
